function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in wastewater","Impact":"Early detection of the virus could have alerted about the imminent danger, providing valuable time to coordinate and implement actions to slow the spread of the disease.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and analysis of wastewater for early detection and response to potential outbreaks.","Technologies":"RT-qPCR assays for detecting viral genome in wastewater.","People":"Community members, public health officials, government authorities.","Owner":"Public health authorities, environmental agencies, local government."}]}
